name: The Asylum Haunt
description:
The Asylum Haunt is a survival horror game. In this game, you play as a paranormal investigator who have come to this asylum to collect 8 possessed teddy bears as evidence. But you are not alone in this mental mental asylum. The demon will chase you till your death. You can only run from it but cannot hide. Collect 8 teddies and you will win the game. Good Luck!

Controls : 

W, Up Arrow Key - Move Up.

S, Down Arrow Key - Move Down.

A, Left Arrow Key - Move Left.

D, Right Arrow Key - Move Right.

Credit :

This game is made by Kavish Tomar.
